text: [Music]
rescuing a neighbor from under rubble
this unverified footage appears to show
the aftermath of air raid on the
northern city of Aleppo activists say
the Syrian government forces killed 90
civilians in the latest wave of bombing
another video posted online shows the
moment a government helicopter drops a
bomb it slams into buildings sending a
pillar of smoke and dust into the air
this video cannot be verified but
opposition activists say the government
forces have been targeting Aleppo for
weeks the city has been the focus of
bitter fighting between the government
and rebels the United Nations has
stopped updating the death toll from
Syria's Civil War but as of July last
year it said at least 100,000 people
have been killed both in international
efforts to stop the fighting after a
week-long conference in Geneva a UN
meeting is taking place in Rome this
Monday but so far there's been no
agreement on a ceasefire and as the
government forces launched an offensive
on areas held by rebels the suffering of
civilians continues mariko a BBC news
[Applause]
